title: I really fucking hate Amumu
body:
No I don't think he's OP or anything so get that out of your mind.

What bugs me about him is everything else. He looks fucking stupid. Practically no one mains him. His abilities are stupid. He has no friends. His Q hitbox is fucking gargantuan.  His name is dumb. I hate saying it. Why does he even exist? I doubt anyone would even notice if he was deleted, which he should be.  


/end 

Had to get that off my chest. :)
